title: No Regrets
description: What will happen after Rebecca is 'Lost In France'?Maxwell sends her to Munich, Germany as part of her work contract. Will Alain come to his senses and realise he has lost the most precious thing on earth - true love? Will Maxwell f*cking Grant get closer to Rebecca? Read why Rebecca wants NO REGRETS!!!Note to Readers: My sincere apologies to readers who have been waiting for this for a while...sadly I lost more than 75% of the manuscript earlier this year due to a computer crash and its been emotionally taxing to rewrite the book - but it is under way - I promise. I don't want to release the book until I'm absolutely happy with it. I'm hoping the wait will be worth it. Thank you for understanding and for your patience.
author: Jani Kay
